summary.span: 在表中显示来自数据源的单个记录的值，其中每个数据行表示一个记录字段。

span.span: Displays the values of a single record from a data source in a table, where each data row represents a field of the record.

summary.span: 控件可用于编辑、删除和插入记录。

span.span: The control allows you to edit, delete, and insert records.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [行字段Row Fields](#row_fields) - [绑定到数据Binding to Data](#binding_to_data) - [安全性Security](#security) - [数据操作Data Operations](#data_operations) - [自定义用户界面Customizing the User Interface](#customizing_the_user_interface) - [事件Events](#events) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#Accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件用于在表中，显示来自数据源的单个记录的记录的每个字段的表的行中的显示位置。The control is used to display a single record from a data source in a table, where each field of the record is displayed in a row of the table. 它可以结合使用母版-详细信息方案的控件。It can be used in combination with a control for master-detail scenarios. 控件支持以下功能：The control supports the following features: - 绑定到数据源控件，如。Binding to data source controls, such as . - 内置插入功能。Built-in inserting capabilities. - 内置的更新和删除功能。Built-in updating and deleting capabilities. - 内置的分页功能。Built-in paging capabilities. - 以编程方式访问对象模型，以便动态设置属性，处理事件，以及其他操作。Programmatic access to the object model to dynamically set properties, handle events, and so on. - 通过主题和样式的自定义外观。Customizable appearance through themes and styles. ## 行字段Row Fields 在每个数据行通过声明一字段控件创建控件。Each data row in the control is created by declaring a field control. 不同的行字段类型确定在控件中的行的行为。Different row field types determine the behavior of the rows in the control. 字段控件派生自。Field controls derive from . 下表列出了可以使用不同的行字段类型。The following table lists the different row field types that can be used. |列字段类型Column field type|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| ||数据源中字段的值显示为文本。Displays the value of a field in a data source as text.| ||显示在一个命令按钮控件。Displays a command button in the control. 这样，您可以显示具有自定义按钮控件，例如添加或删除按钮的行。This allows you to display a row with a custom button control, such as an Add or a Remove button.| ||显示一个复选框在控件。Displays a check box in the control. 此行字段类型通常用于显示具有一个布尔值的字段。This row field type is commonly used to display fields with a Boolean value.| ||显示内置命令按钮以执行编辑、 插入或删除操作控件。Displays built-in command buttons to perform edit, insert, or delete operations in the control.| ||数据源中字段的值显示为超链接。Displays the value of a field in a data source as a hyperlink. 此行字段类型，可将第二个字段绑定到超链接的 URL。This row field type allows you to bind a second field to the hyperlink's URL.| ||中显示图像控件。Displays an image in the control.| ||显示用户定义的内容中的行根据指定的模板的控件。Displays user-defined content for a row in the control according to a specified template. 此行字段类型，可创建自定义行字段。This row field type allows you to create a custom row field.| 默认情况下属性设置为`true`，该数据源中自动生成的绑定的行字段对象的每个字段的可绑定的类型。By default, the property is set to `true`, which automatically generates a bound row field object for each field of a bindable type in the data source. 有效的可绑定类型是， ， ， ，和的基元类型的集合。Valid bindable types are , , , , and the set of primitive types. 然后将每个字段显示在一行中为文本，在每个字段在数据源中的显示的顺序。Each field is then displayed in a row as text, in the order in which each field appears in the data source. 自动生成行提供快速而简单的方式来显示记录中的每个字段。Automatically generating the rows provides a quick and easy way to display every field in the record. 但是，若要使利用控制的高级的功能，必须显式声明要包含在中的行字段控件。However, to make use of the control's advanced capabilities you must explicitly declare the row fields to include in the control. 若要声明的行字段，请首先设置属性设置为`false`。To declare the row fields, first set the property to `false`. 接下来，添加左括号和右``标记的开始和结束标记之间控件。Next, add opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 最后，列出你想要包括的开始和结束之间的行字段``标记。Finally, list the row fields that you want to include between the opening and closing `` tags. 指定的行字段添加到集合的顺序列出。The row fields specified are added to the collection in the order listed. 集合允许你以编程方式管理中的行字段控件。The collection allows you to programmatically manage the row fields in the control. > [!NOTE] > 不会自动生成的行字段添加到集合。Automatically generated row fields are not added to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 显式声明的行字段可以显示与自动生成的行字段结合使用。Explicitly declared row fields can be displayed in combination with automatically generated row fields. 同时使用时，显式声明的行字段自动生成的行字段后跟第一次，呈现。When both are used, explicitly declared row fields are rendered first, followed by the automatically generated row fields. ## 绑定到数据Binding to Data 控件可以绑定到数据源控件 (如控制或控件) 或实现任何数据源集合接口，如， ， ，或其他集合类型。The control can be bound to a data source control (such as the control or control) or to any data source collection that implements the interface, such as , , , or other collection types. 使用以下方法之一将绑定到适当的数据源类型的控件：Use one of the following methods to bind the control to the appropriate data source type: - 若要将绑定到数据源控件，设置的属性控制对数据源控件的值。To bind to a data source control, set the property of the control to the value of the data source control. 控件自动绑定到指定的数据源控件。The control automatically binds to the specified data source control. 这是要将绑定到数据的首选的方法。This is the preferred method to bind to data. - 若要绑定到实现的数据源接口，以编程方式设置的属性控制到数据源，然后调用方法。To bind to a data source that implements the interface, programmatically set the property of the control to the data source and then call the method. 数据绑定的详细信息，请参阅[绑定到数据库](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。For more information on data binding, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742). ## 安全性Security 此控件用于显示用户输入，这可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端的可执行脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送应用程序中显示的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供了用户输入到脚本块和 HTML 的输入的请求验证功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). 验证服务器控件还提供用于评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[验证服务器控件语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). ## 数据操作Data Operations 控件提供了内置功能，允许用户更新、 删除、 插入和翻页查看控件中的项。The control provides built-in capabilities that allow the user to update, delete, insert, and page through items in the control. 当控件绑定到数据源控件，控件可以利用数据源控件的功能并提供自动更新、 删除、 插入和分页功能。When the control is bound to a data source control, the control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic updating, deleting, inserting, and paging functionality. > [!NOTE] > 控件可为 update、 delete、 insert 和分页操作与其他类型的数据源提供支持; 但是，必须提供相应的事件处理程序中的这些操作的实现。The control can provide support for update, delete, insert, and paging operations with other types of data sources; however, you must provide the implementation for these operations in an appropriate event handler. 有关详细信息，请参阅、和。For more information, see , , and . 控件可自动添加带有编辑、 删除或新建按钮通过设置行字段， ，或属性设置为`true`分别。The control can automatically add a row field with an Edit, Delete, or New button by setting the , , or properties to `true`, respectively. 与不同的删除按钮 （它立即删除所选的记录），单击编辑或新建按钮，控件进入编辑模式或分别插入模式。Unlike the Delete button (which deletes the selected record immediately), when the Edit or New button is clicked, the control goes into edit or insert mode, respectively. 在编辑模式下，编辑按钮是更新和替换取消按钮。In edit mode, the Edit button is replaced with an Update and a Cancel button. 输入适合于字段的数据类型的控件 (如或控件) 显示，用户若要修改的字段的值。Input controls that are appropriate for the field's data type (such as a or a control) are displayed with a field's value for the user to modify. 单击更新按钮更新数据源中的记录，而单击取消按钮会放弃所有更改。Clicking the Update button updates the record in the data source, while clicking the Cancel button abandons any changes. 同样，在插入模式下，使用 Insert 和取消按钮，替换新建按钮和空的输入的控件显示用户输入新记录的值。Likewise, in insert mode, the New button is replaced with an Insert and a Cancel button, and empty input controls are displayed for the user to enter the values for the new record. > [!NOTE] > 您可以手动定义 update、 delete 和 insert 命令按钮， ，或行字段。You can also manually define the update, delete, and insert command buttons in a , , or row field. 控件可识别具有按钮属性设置为"编辑"、"更新"、"删除"、"新建"、"插入"或"取消"; 但是，你仍必须提供功能自己。The control recognizes buttons with the property set to "Edit", "Update", "Delete", "New", "Insert", or "Cancel"; however, you still must provide the functionality yourself. 有关详细信息，请参阅、和。For more information, see , , and . 控件提供分页功能，这样用户就可以导航到数据源中的其他记录。The control provides a paging feature, which allows the user to navigate to other records in the data source. 启用时，页面导航控件显示在页导航行。When enabled, page navigation controls are displayed in a pager row. 若要启用分页，请设置属性设置为`true`。To enable paging, set the property to `true`. 可以使用自定义的页导航行和属性。The pager row can be customized using the and properties. ## 自定义用户界面Customizing the User Interface 你可以自定义外观通过设置控件的不同部分的样式属性的控件。You can customize the appearance of the control by setting the style properties for different parts of the control. 下表列出了可以设置的样式属性。The following table lists the style properties that you can set. |样式属性Style property|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||中的交替数据行的样式设置控件。The style settings for the alternating data rows in the control. 当设置此属性时，数据行显示在带区，之间交替设置和设置。When this property is set, the data rows are displayed in bands, alternating between the settings and the settings.| ||包含内置命令按钮的行的样式设置。The style settings for the row that contains the built-in command buttons.| ||时行数据的样式设置控件处于编辑模式。The style settings for the data rows when the control is in edit mode.| ||中显示的空数据行的样式设置控制当数据源不包含任何记录。The style settings for the empty data row that are displayed in the control when the data source does not contain any records.| ||脚注行的样式设置。The style settings for the footer row.| ||标头行的样式设置。The style settings for the header row.| ||时行数据的样式设置控件处于插入模式。The style settings for the data rows when the control is in insert mode.| ||页导航行的样式设置。The style settings for the pager row.| ||中的数据行的样式设置控件。The style settings for the data rows in the control. 当属性也设置，显示数据行之间交替设置和设置。When the property is also set, the data rows are displayed alternating between the settings and the settings.| ||标题列的样式设置。The style settings for the header column.| ## 事件Events 控件提供了几个事件，可以对其进行编程。The control provides several events that you can program against. 这样，您可以运行自定义的例程，每当发生的事件。This allows you to run a custom routine whenever an event occurs. 下表列出了支持的事件控件。The following table lists the events supported by the control. 控件将这些事件还继承其基类，这些类： ， ， ， ， ， ，和。The control also inherits these events from its base classes: , , , , , , and . |事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||在 控件中单击某个按钮时发生。Occurs when a button is clicked in the control.| ||发生毕竟中创建对象控件。Occurs after all objects are created in the control. 此事件通常用于显示之前修改的记录的值。This event is often used to modify the values of a record before it is displayed.| ||单击删除按钮，但之后时发生控件从数据源中删除记录。Occurs when a Delete button is clicked, but after the control deletes the record from the data source. 此事件通常用于检查删除操作的结果。This event is often used to check the results of the delete operation.| ||单击删除按钮，之前时发生控件从数据源中删除记录。Occurs when a Delete button is clicked, but before the control deletes the record from the data source. 此事件通常用于取消删除操作。This event is often used to cancel the delete operation.| ||单击插入按钮，但之后时发生控件插入记录。Occurs when an Insert button is clicked, but after the control inserts the record. 此事件通常用于检查 insert 操作的结果。This event is often used to check the results of the insert operation.| ||单击插入按钮，之前时发生控件插入记录。Occurs when an Insert button is clicked, but before the control inserts the record. 此事件通常用于取消插入操作。This event is often used to cancel the insert operation.| ||单击更新按钮，但之后时发生控件对该行进行更新。Occurs when an Update button is clicked, but after the control updates the row. 此事件通常用于检查更新操作的结果。This event is often used to check the results of the update operation.| ||单击更新按钮，之前时发生控件更新的记录。Occurs when an Update button is clicked, but before the control updates the record. 此事件通常用于取消更新操作。This event is often used to cancel the update operation.| ||之后，将会控件更改 （编辑、 插入或只读模式下） 的模式。Occurs after the control changes modes (edit, insert, or read-only mode). 此事件通常用于执行某项任务时控件更改模式。This event is often used to perform a task when the control changes modes.| ||之前发生控件更改 （编辑、 插入或只读模式下） 的模式。Occurs before the control changes modes (edit, insert, or read-only mode). 此事件通常用于取消模式更改。This event is often used to cancel a mode change.| ||在单击某一页导航按钮时，但在 控件处理分页操作之后发生。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the control handles the paging operation. 当您需要执行的任务后用户导航到该控件中的不同记录时，通常使用此事件。This event is commonly used when you need to perform a task after the user navigates to a different record in the control.| ||在单击某一页导航按钮时，但在 控件处理分页操作之前发生。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the control handles the paging operation. 此事件通常用于取消分页操作。This event is often used to cancel the paging operation.| ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件，以便它将生成符合辅助功能标准标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用用于控制结合一个简单的母版-详细信息方案的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use to use a control in combination with a control for a simple master-detail scenario. 它显示中选择的项的详细信息控件。It displays the details of an item selected in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewSimple/CS/detailsviewsimplecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewSimple/VB/detailsviewsimplevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件来添加、 删除和编辑记录。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to add, delete, and edit records. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewComplex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewComplex/CS/detailsviewcomplexcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewComplex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewComplex/VB/detailsviewcomplexvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式添加到的行字段控件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively add row fields to the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewRowField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewRowField/CS/detailsviewrowfieldscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewRowField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewRowField/VB/detailsviewrowfieldsvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 若要动态添加控制转移到一个页面，创建一个新对象和设置其属性，然后将其添加到集合的容器控件，如。To dynamically add a control to a page, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the collection of a container control, such as . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此构造函数中动态添加到页面的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to dynamically add a control to a page. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件具有内置的分页功能，允许用户导航到数据源中的不同记录。The control has built-in paging capabilities, which allow a user to navigate to a different record in the data source. 控件可执行用户界面 (UI) 和数据源分页。The control can perform both user interface (UI) and data source paging. 用户界面分页功能可用于支持任何数据源对象接口。The UI paging feature can be used with any data source object that supports the interface. 对于每个分页操作，控制查询整个数据收集的数据源，并选择行以显示，实质上丢弃剩余的数据。For each paging operation, the control queries the data source for the entire data collection and selects the row to display, essentially discarding the remaining data. 如果数据源实现并属性将返回`true`，则控件将使用数据源分页，而不是 UI 分页。If a data source implements and the property returns `true`, the control will use data source paging instead of UI paging. 在这种情况下，控件将查询仅每个分页操作所需的行。In this case, the control will query for only the row needed for each paging operation. 因此，数据源分页是比 UI 分页更有效。Thus, data source paging is more efficient than UI paging. 仅对象支持而无需修改的数据源分页。Only the object supports data source paging without modification. 若要启用分页功能，请设置属性设置为`true`。To enable the paging feature, set the property to `true`. 您可以使用来确定的基础数据源中的项总数属性。You can determine the total number of items in the underlying data source by using the property. 若要确定当前显示的项的索引，请使用属性。To determine the index of the currently displayed item, use the property. 启用分页后，调用页导航行的附加行自动显示在控件。When paging is enabled, an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the control. 页导航行包含页导航控件，并可以显示在顶部、 底部，或同时的顶部和底部的控件。The pager row contains the page navigation controls and can be displayed at the top, bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control. 页导航行具有两个内置的页导航的显示模式： 带编号的网页和下一步和前一页链接 （默认值）。The pager row has two built-in pager display modes: numbered pages and next and previous page links (default). 带编号的页模式显示为单个页，以便用户能够导航到特定页面的链接。The numbered pages mode displays links for the individual pages, allowing the user to navigate to a specific page. 下一步和上一链接模式显示允许用户导航到下一步或前一页的控件。The next and previous links mode displays controls that allow the user to navigate to the next or the previous page. > [!NOTE] > 控件会自动隐藏的页导航行时数据源包含少于两个记录。The control automatically hides the pager row when the data source contains fewer than two records. 你可以通过使用控制的设置 （例如寻呼程序显示模式，可在时间和页导航控件的文本标签显示的页链接数） 的页导航行属性。You can control the settings of the pager row (such as the pager display mode, the number of page links to display at a time, and the pager control's text label) by using the property. 若要控制 （包括其背景色、 字体颜色和位置） 的页导航行的外观，请使用属性。To control the appearance of the pager row (including its background color, font color, and position), use the property. 控件还允许你定义的页导航行的自定义模板。The control also allows you to define a custom template for the pager row. 有关创建自定义页导航行模板的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on creating a custom pager row template, see . 控件提供了可用于在发生分页时执行自定义操作的多个事件。The control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when paging occurs. 下表列出了可用的事件。The following table lists the available events. |事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||在单击某一页导航按钮时，但在 控件处理分页操作之后发生。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the control handles the paging operation. 当您需要执行的任务后用户导航到该控件中的不同记录时，通常使用此事件。This event is commonly used when you need to perform a task after the user navigates to a different record in the control.| ||在单击某一页导航按钮时，但在 控件处理分页操作之前发生。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the control handles the paging operation. 此事件通常用于取消分页操作。This event is often used to cancel the paging operation.| 值存储在视图状态。The value of is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来启用分页功能的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to enable the paging capabilities of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewAllowPaging/CS/detailsviewallowpagingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewAllowPaging/VB/detailsviewallowpagingvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时控件绑定到一个对象，继承自并属性将返回`true`，则控件可以利用数据源控件的功能并提供自动正在删除功能。When a control is bound to an object that inherits from and the property returns `true`, the control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic deleting functionality. > [!NOTE] > 有关对象中删除数据，属性的基础必须删除查询语句设置对象。For a object to delete data, the property of the underlying object must be set with a delete query statement. 当属性设置为`true`即带有删除按钮的行字段自动显示在控件。When the property is set to `true`, a row field with a Delete button is automatically displayed in the control. 单击删除按钮永久从数据源中删除该记录。Clicking the Delete button permanently removes that record from the data source. > [!NOTE] > 您还必须设置即可使用自动删除功能的属性。You must also set the property for the automatic deletion feature to work. 控件提供了可用于删除一条记录时执行自定义操作的多个事件。The control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when a record is deleted. 下表列出了可用的事件。The following table lists the available events. |事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||单击删除按钮，但之后时发生控件从数据源中删除记录。Occurs when the Delete button is clicked, but after the control deletes the record from the data source. 此事件通常用于检查删除操作的结果。This event is often used to check the results of the delete operation.| ||单击删除按钮，之前时发生控件从数据源中删除记录。Occurs when the Delete button is clicked, but before the control deletes the record from the data source. 此事件通常用于取消删除操作。This event is often used to cancel the delete operation.| 值存储在视图状态。The value of is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来显示要删除当前记录的内置控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the built-in control to delete the current record. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当支持更新的数据源控件绑定到控件，控件可以利用数据源控件的功能并提供自动更新功能。When a data source control that supports updating is bound to a control, the control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic updating functionality. > [!NOTE] > 为了使数据源控件更新数据，其属性必须设置使用的更新查询语句。For a data source control to update data, its property must be set with an update query statement. 当属性设置为`true`即有一个编辑按钮的行字段自动显示在控件。When the property is set to `true`, a row field with an Edit button is automatically displayed in the control. 单击编辑按钮将其置于控件处于编辑模式。Clicking the Edit button puts that control in edit mode. 在编辑模式下，每个字段绑定不是只读的控件中显示相应的输入的控件，如控件，该字段的数据类型。When in edit mode, each bound field in the control that is not read-only displays the appropriate input control, such as a control, for the field's data type. 这允许用户修改字段的值。This allows the user to modify the field's value. 单击时，编辑按钮是还替换为更新按钮和取消按钮。When clicked, the Edit button is also replaced with an Update button and a Cancel button. 单击更新按钮的任何值更改更新数据源中的记录，并将该控件返回到所指定的模式属性。Clicking the Update button updates the record in the data source with any value changes and returns the control to the mode specified by the property. 单击取消按钮放弃任何值发生更改，并将该控件返回到默认模式。Clicking the Cancel button abandons any value changes and returns the control to the default mode. > [!NOTE] > 若要将放以编程方式控制处于编辑模式，请使用方法。To put a control in edit mode programmatically, use the method. 当属性也设置为`true`，则控制会自动确保或多个字段中指定属性是只读的。When the property is also set to `true`, the control automatically ensures that the field or fields specified in the property are read-only. > [!NOTE] > 除非您实现您自己的更新功能，你必须设置自动更新功能，若要运行的属性。Unless you implement your own updating functionality, you must set the property for the automatic updating feature to work. 您可以控制数据的外观时行控件处于编辑模式下使用属性。You can control the appearance of the data rows when the control is in edit mode by using the property. 常用的设置通常包括自定义背景色、 前景色和字体属性。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties. 控件提供了可用于更新记录时执行自定义操作的多个事件。The control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when a record is updated. 下表列出了可用的事件。The following table lists the available events. |事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||单击更新按钮，但之后时发生控件更新的记录。Occurs when the Update button is clicked, but after the control updates the record. 此事件通常用于检查更新操作的结果。This event is often used to check the results of the update operation.| ||单击更新按钮，之前时发生控件更新的记录。Occurs when the Update button is clicked, but before the control updates the record. 此事件通常用于取消更新操作。This event is often used to cancel the update operation.| ||之后，将会控件更改模式。Occurs after the control changes modes.| ||之前发生控件更改模式。Occurs before the control changes modes. 此事件通常用于取消模式更改。This event is often used to cancel the mode change.| 值存储在视图状态。The value of is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来显示来编辑当前记录的内置控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the built-in controls to edit the current record. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewAutoGenerateEditButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewAutoGenerateEditButton/CS/detailsviewautogenerateeditbuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewAutoGenerateEditButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewAutoGenerateEditButton/VB/detailsviewautogenerateeditbuttonvb.aspx#1)]

control's capabilities and provide automatic inserting functionality. > [!NOTE] > 为了使数据源控件以插入数据，其属性必须与 insert 查询语句设置。For a data source control to insert data, its property must be set with an insert query statement. 当属性设置为`true`即具有一个新按钮的行字段自动显示在控件。When the property is set to `true`, a row field with a New button is automatically displayed in the control. 单击新建按钮将其置于控件处于插入模式。Clicking the New button puts that control in insert mode. 在插入模式下，每个字段绑定不是只读的控件中显示相应的输入的控件，如控件，该字段的数据类型。When in insert mode, each bound field in the control that is not read-only displays the appropriate input control, such as a control, for the field's data type. 这允许用户在新记录的输入字段的值。This allows the user to enter the field's value for the new record. 单击时，新建按钮是还替换为插入按钮和取消按钮。When clicked, the New button is also replaced with an Insert button and a Cancel button. 单击插入按钮在数据源中插入新记录并将控件返回到所指定的模式属性。Clicking the Insert button inserts the new record in the data source and returns the control to the mode specified by the property. 单击取消按钮放弃插入操作，并将该控件返回到默认模式。Clicking the Cancel button abandons the insert operation and returns the control to the default mode. > [!NOTE] > 若要以编程方式将某行置于插入模式，使用方法。To put a row in insert mode programmatically, use the method. 您可以控制是在插入模式下使用一条记录的外观属性。You can control the appearance of a record that is in insert mode by using the property. 常用的设置通常包括自定义背景色、 前景色和字体属性。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties. 控件提供了可用于插入新记录时执行自定义操作的多个事件。The control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when a new record is inserted. 下表列出了可用的事件。The following table lists the available events. |事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||单击插入按钮，但之后时发生控件插入记录。Occurs when the Insert button is clicked, but after the control inserts the record. 此事件通常用于检查 insert 操作的结果。This event is often used to check the results of the insert operation.| ||单击插入按钮，之前时发生控件插入记录。Occurs when the Insert button is clicked, but before the control inserts the record. 此事件通常用于取消插入操作。This event is often used to cancel the insert operation.| ||之后，将会控件更改模式。Occurs after the control changes modes.| ||之前发生控件更改模式。Occurs before the control changes modes. 此事件通常用于取消模式更改。This event is often used to cancel the mode change.| 值存储在视图状态。The value of is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来显示来插入新记录中的内置控件控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the built-in controls to insert a new record in a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在每个数据行控件由行字段。Each data row in the control is represented by a row field. 当属性设置为`true`，为数据源中的每个字段创建一个自动生成的绑定的行字段。When the property is set to `true`, an automatically generated bound row field is created for each field in the data source. 然后将每个字段显示在一行中为文本，在每个字段在数据源中的显示的顺序。Each field is then displayed in a row as text, in the order in which each field appears in the data source. > [!NOTE] > 不会自动生成的绑定的行字段添加到集合。Automatically generated bound row fields are not added to the collection. 自动生成行提供快速而简单的方式来显示记录中的每个字段。Automatically generating the rows provides a quick and easy way to display every field in the record. 但是，若要使利用控制的高级的功能，必须显式声明要包含在中的行字段控件。However, to make use of the control's advanced capabilities you must explicitly declare the row fields to include in the control. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . > [!NOTE] > 与自动生成的行字段结合使用，可以使用显式声明的行字段。Explicitly declared row fields can be used in combination with automatically generated row fields. 同时使用时，显式声明的行字段自动生成的行字段后跟第一次，呈现。When both are used, explicitly declared row fields are rendered first, followed by the automatically generated row fields. 值存储在视图状态。The value of is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性自动在数据源中创建的每个字段的绑定的行字段。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to automatically create bound row fields for each field in the data source. value.span: 一个 ，表示 控件中的底部页导航行。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用了分页 (通过设置属性设置为`true`)，调用页导航行的附加行自动显示在控件。When paging is enabled (by setting the property to `true`), an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the control. 页导航行包含允许用户导航到其他记录，并可以显示在顶部、 底部，或同时的顶部和底部的控件的控件。The pager row contains controls that allow the user to navigate to other records, and can be displayed at the top, the bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control. 使用属性以编程方式访问对象，表示中的底部页导航行控件。Use the property to programmatically access the object that represents the bottom pager row in the control. > [!NOTE] > 属性是后，才可控件创建的底部页导航行中事件。The property is available only after the control creates the bottom pager row in the event. 当您需要以编程方式处理的底部页导航行，例如添加自定义内容时，通常使用此属性。This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the bottom pager row, for example when adding custom content. 对任何修改属性必须在执行之后控件已经被呈现; 否则为控件将覆盖任何更改。Any modification to the property must be performed after the control has been rendered; otherwise, the control will overwrite any changes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来访问的底部页导航行期间控制事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access the bottom pager row of the control during the event. 两个然后使用当前页码和总页数更新中的自定义的页导航行的控件。Two controls within the custom pager row are then updated with the current page number and total number of pages. summary.span: 获取或设置单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的空间量。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.

value.span: 单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的空间量（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The amount of space, in pixels, between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.

value.span: 默认值为 -1，表示未设置此属性。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性控制的单元格内容和单元格的边框之间的间距。Use the property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. 指定的填充量添加到单元格的所有四个边。The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of the cell. 相同的列中的所有单元格控件具有相同的宽度。All cells in the same column of a control have the same width. 填充量应用到宽的单元格和列中的所有其他单元格调整为该单元格的宽度。The padding amount is applied to the widest cell and all other cells in the column are adjusted to that cell width. 同样，在同一行中的所有单元格具有相同的高度。Similarly, all cells in the same row have the same height. 填充量应用到的行中最高的单元格和行中的所有其他单元格调整为该单元格的高度。The padding amount is applied to the tallest cell in the row and all other cells in the row are adjusted to that cell height. 不能指定单个单元格的大小。Individual cell sizes cannot be specified. 若要调整单元格之间的间距，请使用属性。To adjust the spacing between cells, use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定的单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的间距大小。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the amount of spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定是否控件处于编辑、 插入或只读模式。Use the property to determine whether the control is in edit, insert, or read-only mode. 下表列出了不同的模式值。The following table lists the different mode values. |模式Mode|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |`DetailsViewMode.Edit`|控件处于编辑模式，这样用户就可以更新的记录的值。The control is in edit mode, which allows the user to update the values of a record.| |`DetailsViewMode.Insert`|控件处于插入模式，这样用户就可以将一条新记录添加到数据源。The control is in insert mode, which allows the user to add a new record to the data source.| |`DetailsViewMode.ReadOnly`|控件是否处于只读模式，这是正常的显示模式。The control is in read-only mode, which is the normal display mode.| 此值通常会自动设置通过单击新建、 更新、 插入、 删除或取消命令按钮时的控件。This value is normally set automatically by the control by when the New, Update, Insert, Delete, or Cancel command button is clicked. 您可以以编程方式更改模式，通过使用方法。You can also programmatically change the mode by using the method. 当控件更改模式，会引发以下表中的事件。When the control changes modes, the events in the following table are raised. 这允许你创建的自定义事件处理程序在事件发生时执行一个例程。This allows you to create a custom event handler that performs a routine when the event occurs. |事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||发生更改的模式的命令按钮时单击控件，但在模式更改之后。Occurs when a command button that changes the mode of the control is clicked, but after the mode changes.| ||发生更改的模式的命令按钮时单击控件，但在模式更改之前。Occurs when a command button that changes the mode of the control is clicked, but before the mode changes.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定是否控件处于编辑、 插入或只读模式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether the control is in edit, insert, or read-only mode. 如果用户尝试导航到不同的记录段控件处于编辑模式下，取消分页操作。If the user attempts to navigate to a different record while the control is in edit mode, the paging operation is canceled. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewCurrentMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewCurrentMode/CS/detailsviewcurrentmodecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewCurrentMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewCurrentMode/VB/detailsviewcurrentmodevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取 对象的集合，这些对象表示 控件中显式声明的行字段。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that represent the explicitly declared row fields in a control.

value.span: 一个 ，包含 控件中所有显式声明的行字段。

span.span: A that contains all explicitly declared row fields in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显式声明的行字段控件，这些行字段存储在属性 （集合）。When you explicitly declare the row fields for a control, these row fields are stored in the property (collection). 集合还允许你以编程方式管理的显式声明的行的集合。The collection also allows you to programmatically manage the collection of explicitly declared rows. > [!NOTE] > 与自动生成的行字段结合使用，可以使用显式声明的行字段。Explicitly declared row fields can be used in combination with automatically generated row fields. 同时使用时，显式声明的行字段自动生成的行字段后跟第一次，呈现。When both are used, explicitly declared row fields are rendered first, followed by the automatically generated row fields. 不会自动生成的行字段添加到集合。Automatically generated row fields are not added to the collection. 不同的行字段类型确定在控件中的行的行为。Different row field types determine the behavior of the rows in the control. 下表显示不同的行中可以使用的字段类型集合。The following table shows the different row field types that can be used in the collection. |行的字段类型Row field type|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||数据源中字段的值显示为文本。Displays the value of a field in a data source as text.| ||显示在一个命令按钮控件。Displays a command button in the control. 这样，您可以显示具有自定义按钮控件，例如添加或删除按钮的行。This allows you to display a row with a custom button control, such as an Add or a Remove button.| ||显示一个复选框在控件。Displays a check box in the control. 此行字段类型通常用于显示具有一个布尔值的字段。This row field type is commonly used to display fields with a Boolean value.| ||显示内置命令按钮以执行编辑、 插入或删除操作控件。Displays built-in command buttons to perform edit, insert, or delete operations in the control.| ||数据源中字段的值显示为超链接。Displays the value of a field in a data source as a hyperlink. 此行字段类型，可将第二个字段绑定到超链接的 URL。This row field type allows you to bind a second field to the hyperlink's URL.| ||中显示图像控件。Displays an image in the control.| ||显示用户定义的内容中的行根据指定的模板的控件。Displays user-defined content for a row in the control according to a specified template. 此行字段类型，可创建自定义行字段。This row field type allows you to create a custom row field.| 若要显式声明的行字段控件，第一组属性设置为`false`。To explicitly declare the row fields for a control, first set the property to `false`. 接下来，添加左括号和右``标记的开始和结束标记之间控件。Next, add opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 最后，列出你想要包括的开始和结束之间的行字段``标记。Finally, list the row fields that you want to include between the opening and closing `` tags. 中显示的行字段控件中显示的行字段的顺序集合。The row fields are displayed in the control in the order that the row fields appear in the collection. 尽管您可以以编程方式添加到的行字段集合，它是更轻松地列出行字段中以声明方式控制，然后使用属性的每个行字段以显示或隐藏行字段。Although you can programmatically add row fields to the collection, it is easier to list the row fields declaratively in the control and then use the property of each row field to show or hide the row field. 如果的行字段的属性设置为`false`，行不会显示在控件和行的数据不会对客户端进行一次往返过程。If the property of a row field is set to `false`, the row is not displayed in the control and the data for the row does not make a round trip to the client. 如果您希望为不可见，以进行往返行程的行的数据，将添加到的字段名称属性。If you want the data for a row that is not visible to make a round trip, add the field name to the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式添加到的行字段的集合控件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively add row fields to the collection of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewFields#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewFields/CS/DetailsViewFieldsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewFields#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewFields/VB/DetailsViewFieldsVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的删除按钮时引发事件单击控件，但在删除操作之后。The event is raised when a Delete button within the control is clicked, but after the delete operation. 这使您可以提供的事件处理程序执行自定义的例程，例如每次此事件发生时检查删除操作的结果。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of the delete operation, whenever this event occurs. 一个对象传递给事件处理程序，可用于确定受影响的行和可能发生的任何异常的数量。A object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the number of rows affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 您还可以指示是否已在事件处理程序处理异常通过设置属性。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler by setting the property. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件以刷新后控制控件执行删除操作。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to refresh a control after a control performs a delete operation. 这会使控件与同步控件。This keeps the control synchronized with the control. span.span: Occurs when a control attempts to change between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but after the property is updated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时控件尝试更改之间编辑、 插入和只读模式，但之后更新属性。The event is raised when a control attempts to change between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but after the property is updated. 这允许您提供的事件处理程序执行自定义的例程，如同步与另一个控件，每次此事件发生时的控件。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as synchronizing the control with another control, whenever this event occurs. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件标头行中显示的当前模式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to display the current mode in the header row. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewModeChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewModeChanged/CS/detailsviewmodechangedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewModeChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewModeChanged/VB/detailsviewmodechangedvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 当 控件尝试在编辑、插入和只读模式之间更改时，但在更新 属性之前发生。

span.span: Occurs when a control attempts to change between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but before the property is updated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时控制尝试之前编辑、 插入和只读模式之间更改更新属性。The event is raised when a control attempts to change between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but before the property is updated. 这使您可以提供执行自定义的例程，如取消模式更改时将发生此事件的事件处理程序。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the mode change, whenever this event occurs. 一个对象传递给事件处理程序，可用于确定新的模式下，若要确定是否取消编辑操作，用户的结果模式下更改或取消模式更改。A object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the new mode, to determine whether the mode change was a result of the user canceling an edit operation, or to cancel the mode change. 若要确定新的模式，请使用属性。To determine the new mode, use the property. 若要确定模式更改是否由用户取消编辑操作的结果，请使用属性。To determine whether the mode change was a result of the user canceling an edit operation, use the property. 可以通过设置取消模式更改属性设置为`true`。You can cancel the mode change by setting the property to `true`. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用时，事件可禁用分页功能控件处于编辑模式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to disable the paging feature when the control is in edit mode. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewModeChanging#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewModeChanging/CS/detailsviewmodechangingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewModeChanging#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewModeChanging/VB/detailsviewmodechangingvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用来控制何时在页生命周期内发生数据绑定。The method is used to control when data binding occurs within the life cycle of the page. 做到这一点通过设置数据绑定控件的内部初始化的状态。It does this by setting the internal initialized state of the data-bound control. 由于该控件的初始化状态设置期间页面的生命周期阶段事件处理程序调用该控件的数据属性更改后该阶段，以指示该控件必须重新绑定到其数据的任何时间之前呈现。Because the control's initialized state is set during the phase of the page's life cycle, the event handler is called any time a data property of the control is changed after that phase, to signal that the control must re-bind to its data before rendering. 方法重写类来设置属性设置为`true`情况下，HTTP 请求是一个回发和启用了视图状态但尚未绑定的数据绑定控件中。The method is overridden by the class to set the property to `true` in cases where the HTTP request is a postback and view state is enabled but the data-bound control has not yet been bound. 此方案是常见的控件，如和、 在运行时更改控件的可见性的位置。This scenario is common with controls such as and , where the visibility of the control is changed at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件将引发事件的页导航按钮时 (与按钮及其`CommandName`属性设置为"页") 在控件内单击时，之后控件处理分页操作。The control raises the event when a pager button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Page") within the control is clicked, but after the control handles the paging operation. 这使您可以提供的事件处理程序每次此事件发生时执行自定义的例程。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 以编程方式设置时不会引发此事件属性。This event is not raised when you programmatically set the property. 页导航按钮通常位于中的页导航行控件。Pager buttons are usually located in the pager row of a control. 此事件通常用来同步控件，其控件，或设置的行为在分页操作后的控件。This event is often used to synchronize a control with a control or to set the behavior of the control after a paging operation. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件，将返回到只读模式下，当用户导航到另一条记录。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to return the to read-only mode when the user navigates to another record. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以控制的设置中的页导航行控件。Use the property to control the settings of the pager row in a control. 分页功能启用时显示的页导航行 (通过设置属性设置为`true`) 并包含允许用户导航到控件中的不同记录的控件。The pager row is displayed when the paging feature is enabled (by setting the property to `true`) and contains the controls that allow the user to navigate to the different records in the control. 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性对象返回。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以在窗体中以声明方式设置属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是属性的对象 (例如， `PagerSetting-Mode`)。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `PagerSetting-Mode`). 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `PagerSetting.Mode`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `PagerSetting.Mode`). 常用的设置通常包括页导航行的显示模式和自定义文本或导航控件的图像。Common settings usually include the pager row's display mode and custom text or images for the navigation controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定的页导航行的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the properties of the pager row. remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用了分页 (通过设置属性设置为`true`)，调用页导航行的附加行自动显示在控件。When paging is enabled (by setting the property to `true`), an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the control. 页导航行包含允许用户导航到其他记录，并可以显示在顶部、 底部，或同时的顶部和底部的控件的控件。The pager row contains controls that allow the user to navigate to other records, and can be displayed at the top, the bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control. 使用属性以编程方式访问对象，表示中的顶部页导航行控件。Use the property to programmatically access the object that represents the top pager row in the control. > [!NOTE] > 属性是后，才可控件创建的底部页导航行中事件。The property is available only after the control creates the bottom pager row in the event. 当您需要以编程方式处理的顶部页导航行，例如添加自定义内容时，通常使用此属性。This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the top pager row, for example when adding custom content. 对任何修改属性必须在执行之后控件已经被呈现; 否则为控件将覆盖任何更改。Any modification to the property must be performed after the control has been rendered; otherwise, the control will overwrite any changes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来访问的顶部页导航行期间控制事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access the top pager row of the control during the event. 两个然后使用当前页码和总页数更新中的自定义的页导航行的控件。Two controls within the custom pager row are then updated with the current page number and total number of pages. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewTopPagerRow#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewTopPagerRow/CS/detailsviewtoppagerrowcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewTopPagerRow#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewTopPagerRow/VB/detailsviewtoppagerrowvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件处于编辑模式，请使用方法以编程方式更新数据源中的当前记录。When the control is in edit mode, use the method to programmatically update the current record in the data source. 需要进行更新的当前记录从外部时，通常使用此方法控制，例如，从页面上的其他控件。This method is commonly used when you need to update the current record from outside of the control, such as from a different control on the page. > [!NOTE] > 被调用; 否则为此方法时，控件必须处于编辑模式引发异常。The control must be in edit mode when this method is called; otherwise, an exception is thrown. 若要指定是否在更新操作之前执行页验证，请使用`causesValidation`参数。To specify whether page validation is performed before the update operation, use the `causesValidation` parameter. 调用此方法还将引发和事件。Calling this method also raises the and events.

exception.span: 此方法在 控件不处于编辑模式时调用。

span.span: This method is called when the control is not in edit mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Web 窗体中使用模型绑定系列教程，请参阅[模型绑定和 Web 窗体](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data)。For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data).
